Model No.: 
DX-S-X-1-600A2

1.Elegant appearance, exquisite interior structure.
2.Comply with: CE, GB14887,EN12368, RoHS and
other related international standards.
3.Energy saving, power consumption 90％ less
than incandescent bulbs
4.High-intensity and efficient LED source, Life
span more than 80000 hrs.
5.Rational designed optical lens，anti-phantom
effect, optimal viewing angle.
6.Dust-proof and waterproof ability.
Environmental friendly, RoHS compliant.
7.SKD shipment feasible, OEM or ODM acceptable,
Customization possible.
